name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Festival of Eclectic Sounds and Global Talent**

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret continues its tradition of curating an eclectic and diverse lineup, featuring 52 artists from a wide array of genres and backgrounds. From the pulsating beats of electronic and house music to the raw energy of post-punk, hip-hop, and alternative rock, the festival offers something for every music enthusiast. Notable genres like indie rock, rap, and R&B also make strong showings, with a sprinkling of unique sounds such as Afro-psychedelic funk, traditional South African music, and highlife reflecting the festival’s commitment to musical diversity. With 98% of artists having Spotify links available, attendees can easily explore the lineup and discover new favorites ahead of the event.

The festival showcases a truly global roster, with artists hailing from 16 countries, including the USA, the Netherlands, the UK, and Australia as key contributors. Lesser-represented regions also shine, with talent from Ghana, South Africa, and Tanzania adding an exciting international flavor. Diversity is further reflected in the gender representation, featuring male, female, mixed-gender, and non-binary artists. Additionally, 12 artists identify as people of color, reflecting the festival’s aim to amplify voices from different cultural backgrounds.

With an average artist rating of 7.2 based on 76.9% of the lineup, Best Kept Secret 2026 has curated a well-received and compelling selection of performers. The festival’s blend of established acts and rising stars ensures a dynamic experience for attendees, while its dedication to inclusivity and variety cements its reputation as a standout event in the global music festival calendar.
